_meta.title: remove mpc/mpc2 planners/controllers
_meta.summary: Hard remove MPC and MPC2 from train/infer/env paths. Forest expert now only supports hybrid_astar (auto=>hybrid_astar). Infer baselines are planner-only (A*, Hybrid A*, RRT*).

metrics_definition.inference_time_s: mean compute time reported in infer outputs
metrics_definition.planner_scope: A*/Hybrid A*/RRT* only; no MPC tracking rows

notes: The self-check commands require local Python deps (matplotlib + gym/gymnasium) in the active environment.
Legacy config keys related to forest_baseline_mpc* are now ignored in infer config loading.
